Articles.Content:
When loading is almost complete, KSP just shuts down. Here is my error log:

[Gargantuan browser-destroying log file snipped by moderator]

Thanks in advance

Edited December 17, 2017 by Snark
Gargantuan browser-destroying log file removed by moderator

Hello @Tunguska_, and welcome to the forum! 

Just to let you know, unfortunately I needed to snip the log file out of your post.  Please do not paste big log files (or any other excessively large text content) into the forum, ever.  It causes bad problems for people.  Aside from being unreadably large, the gargantuan content tends to slow down or lock up browsers even on desktop machines with plenty of RAM and a wired connection.  On mobile devices, it's likely to crash the browser entirely, in addition to sucking up people's precious mobile bandwidth.

Note:  Putting the big log file in a spoiler section, as you did here, actually doesn't help with that problem, any-- it reduces the visual clutter after the page loads, but doesn't actually save people's browsers from having to download the full content.

Supplying log files to help people debug your issues is a great idea.    Just... don't put that content here.

If you ever need to post a big file, put it on some other third-party hosting site (there are lots of them on the internet), and then link to it.  Don't actually put the content in your post itself.

Thanks for your understanding, and I hope you get an answer to your problem soon!
